content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or opinions, but based on reviews and ratings, Cirque du Soleil is always a popular choice for circus performances due to their stunning choreography, high-flying acrobatics, and mesmerizing visuals. The Big Apple Circus also has a loyal following in New York City and is known for its family-friendly atmosphere and talented performers. Ultimately, the circus show one would enjoy the most depends on individual preferences, but both Cirque du Soleil and the Big Apple Circus have a reputation for being top-quality circus performers that are definitely worth experiencing.
